p: The extracts were analyzed by high-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) using a Shimadzu model, equipped with the C18 Phenomenex Gemini column (25 cm × 4.6 mm × 5 μm). The flow rate was 1 mL/min, with scans between 200 and 800 nm, and the injection volume was 10 μL. The mobile phase was as follows: 6% acetic acid in water, 2 mM sodium acetate (eluent A), and acetonitrile (eluent B). The gradient used was as follows: 0 min 5% B, 45 min 15% B, 55 min 30% B, 60 min 50% B, and 65 min 100% B [ 43].
